title: Network Security Fundamentals
description: Core concepts of network security and protocols

questions.text: Which port does HTTPS typically use?
questions.explanation: HTTPS uses port 443 by default, while HTTP uses port 80.

questions.text: What is the purpose of a firewall?
correctAnswers: To monitor and control incoming/outgoing traffic
questions.explanation: Firewalls act as a barrier between trusted and untrusted networks, controlling traffic based on security rules.
